infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Caramelo needs access to your photo library so you can add photos of your pets to their profiles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Caramelo needs permission to save photos of your pets to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Caramelo needs access to your camera so you can take photos of your pets.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Caramelo needs permission to send you reminders about your pet's care schedule, such as vaccinations and vet appointments.
